original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1081)@</color>召喚一個<color=#4cc769>八卦結界</color>，並在 <color=#ccffcc>25</color> 秒內對我方全體強化 <color=#ccffcc>25%</color> 所有抗性。場上只能同時存在一個結界且新的結界會取代舊的，當結界被取代消失時效果也會跟著消失。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1081)@</color>Summon a <color=#4cc769>Bagua enchantment</color>, and in <color=#ccffcc>25</color> Strengthen all resistances to all of us within seconds. <color=#ccffcc>25%</color>. Only one enchantment can exist on the field at the same time and the new enchantment will replace the old one, and the effect will disappear when the enchantment is replaced and disappears.
